head.title: Exeter-Milligan Public Schools - Meals During Closure

meta.content: Exeter-Milligan Public Schools - Meals During Closure

6 April 2020
Dear Parents:
Meals are available for K-12 students. Each day, lunch will be served as well as the next days’ breakfast. For example - Wednesday’s lunch will also include Thursday’s breakfast. Some days might be a warm meal while others may be a sandwich, etc. A weekly menu will be provided. Meals will be available for pickup in Exeter, pickup in Milligan or...

div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

a.title: E-mail this article to a friend.

p.b: Meals are available for K-12 students. Each day, lunch will be served as well as the next days’ breakfast. For example - Wednesday’s lunch will also include Thursday’s breakfast. Some days might be a warm meal while others may be a sandwich, etc. A weekly menu will be provided. Meals will be available for pickup in Exeter, pickup in Milligan or they may be delivered.

To help with our planning, etc, meals will be planned by the week. If you decide to participate in the meal offering, it will be for the WHOLE WEEK. There will NOT be the option of taking just a daily meal as this would be too cumbersome to accommodate. If you do decide to participate we assume you will participate each week unless we hear differently. You may decide weekly to participate, so if there is a week you don’t want to receive meals, please contact Jackie at 266-5911 or email me at paul.sheffield@emwolves.net no later than noon that previous Friday. We are not making extra meals, so you must register in order to receive a meal.

The cost for the meals will be the same as if school was in session: K-12 Breakfast-$1.50, K-6 Lunch-$2.35, JH/HS Lunch - $2.60. If you qualified for free/reduced meals you will still qualify. If your household income has been negatively affected by the COVID-19 crisis and believe you may now qualify for free/reduced meals, please complete an application. This application is available on the school website at www.emwolves.org.
PLEASE NOTE - IF YOU HAVE A NEGATIVE LUNCH BALANCE YOU WILL NOT HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO PARTICIPATE IN THIS MEAL PROGRAM UNTIL THE BALANCE IS POSITIVE.
If you are interested in receiving meals, please complete the Meals During Closure survey. However, you may decide at any time to start receiving meals.

Meal Pick-up time will be 11:45 AM to 12:15 PM at each site. Delivery times may vary depending on the number of deliveries requested. Our goal is to have the meals delivered between 11:45 AM and 12:30 PM. Meals will be placed near the requested steps/door. Please note that some items may require refrigeration after delivery.
Pick-up in Exeter will be at the Activities entrance. For multiple meals, they will be placed in a bag and/or box labeled with your name.
Pick-up in Milligan will be in the west parking lot. For multiple meals, they will be placed in a bag and/or box labeled with your name.
Please contact me if you have any questions.

p.a: This institution is an equal opportunity provider.
